title: Primetime with the Murthys
overview: The breaking news of a big Bollywood actor committing suicide sparks controversial conversations in living rooms across the country including the Murthys living a quiet life in Bengaluru. Nisha and Shiv Murthy, a pair of siblings, embark on a complex self-discovery journey trying to navigate their way through the beast of social media and the race to stay relevant. Through humor and relatable situations, Murthys explores the complexities of family dynamics in today's digital age. This coming-of-age series is about the impact of the toxic news cycle on young adults.
